metadata.title: How to Get YouTube Handle 2025: @Username Setup Guide
metadata.description: Set up your YouTube handle (@username). Choose and claim your channel identity.

hero.headline: How to Get Your YouTube Handle
hero.subheadline: Your @username identity. Make it memorable and claim it now.

sections.content: YouTube handles (@username) are your unique identifier across the platform—appearing in comments, mentions, and your channel URL. Unlike display names, handles must be unique. Claiming the right handle is important for your brand identity and discoverability.

content.title: Unique & Permanent
content.description: Only one channel can have each handle. Changes limited.

content.title: Cross-Platform
content.description: Same @ identity for comments, mentions, Shorts, channel URL.

content.title: Character Rules
content.description: 3-30 characters. Letters, numbers, underscores, periods only.

content.title: No Spaces
content.description: Use underscores or periods for separation if needed.

content.title: Not Impersonating
content.description: Can't use handles that impersonate other creators/brands.

sections.title: Handle Best Practices
content: Match your brand name exactly if possible
Avoid numbers unless part of brand
Check across all platforms for consistency
Consider how it looks in mentions

sections.title: Before Claiming Checklist
content: Not confusingly similar to big channels?
Ready to commit to this handle?

faq.question: Can I change my handle later?
faq.answer: Yes, but limited—typically twice per 14 days. Old handle becomes available for others. Don't rely on changing frequently.

faq.question: What if my name is taken?
faq.answer: Try variations: add 'official', 'hq', 'tv', or your niche. Underscores and periods can help. Or shorten creatively.

faq.question: Handle vs channel name?
faq.answer: Different things. Channel name (display name) can be anything and isn't unique. Handle is your @ identifier and must be unique.

faq.question: Do handles affect SEO?
faq.answer: Minor impact. Main benefit is brand recognition and easier discovery. Your content matters more than handle for SEO.
